name: ExtremeTurbine
description:
Now is your choice to play one of the best games in the PlayStore, you need to concentrate in the blue ball, that is inside the big circle, then avoid the obstacles that are going to appear in the small spheres that are connecting with your main path.

Try to increase your pesonal score, at the same time you can compare with your friends in order to know that you are the best playing the game, a "SHARE" option it is available to send a screenshot with your final score to whatever of your social networks.

Enjoy playing and remember to visit: www.georgegamesnation.com to look up our monthly offers.
